structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases

law.catch_line: Officers; Duty To Specify Items Of Fees
law.text: An officer receiving fees for any official duty or service, who, upon request of the person paying them, refuses or neglects to make out in writing in his return a particular account of such fees, specifying for what they respectively accrued, shall forfeit to such person three times the amount so paid.
